subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Clayton Kershaw pitched his first no-hitter Wednesday night, striking out a career-high 15 in the Los Angeles Dodgers’ 8-0 victory over the Colorado Rockies.
snippet: Clayton Kershaw pitched his first no-hitter Wednesday night, striking out a career-high 15 in the Los Angeles Dodgers’ 8-0 victory over the Colorado Rockies.
